message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it. Can you meet me halfway and consider a price of $11250?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $11250. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is the lowest price I can offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Can you reconsider and meet me at this price?

I understand that you're still hesitant, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500. This is as low as I can go, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I think this is a fair price considering the value this product can bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you reconsider and meet me at this price?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I think this is a fair price considering the value this product can bring to your business.
